entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
